translations: n．依赖，依靠：对某人或某事的支持、帮助或依赖。

sentences.sentence: You declare dependences in a catalog named Gemfile in the root of your application.
sentences.translation: 您可以在应用程序根目录内一个名为 Gemfile 的目录中声明依赖性。

sentences.sentence: Their humidity dependences of capacitance have switching characteristics with transition point about 85%rh.
sentences.translation: 其电容量-湿度关系呈开关特性，转变点约在85% RH。

sentences.sentence: Only when smokers overcome these two dependences can they quit smoking successfully and do not smoke any more.
sentences.translation: 吸烟的人必须克服这两种依赖性，才能很成功的戒烟而不再去吸烟。
